```{r}
# Clear all existing data
rm(list=ls())

# Load packages
library(bbmle)
library(lmerTest)
library(fitdistrplus)
library(sjPlot)
library(car)
library(emmeans)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggpubr)
library(jtools) #summ 
library(rstatix)

# Set working directory from .Renviron
dir <- Sys.getenv("DATA_DIR")
list.files(dir)

# Read in data
insects <- read.csv(file.path(dir, "T7_warmx_insect/L1/2021/T7_warmx_insect_preference_L1.csv"))

```
